message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a high-quality item at a competitive price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $150?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $160 for the product. Can you consider that?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I still believe we can reach an agreement closer to my budget. Could you consider selling the product to me for $150?
Hi Bob, I understand you're still trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $165. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make a profit. Can you consider that?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to propose a price of $155 for the product. This is my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to make a final offer, but I'm still not willing to go below $170. I'm getting a bit concerned that we're running out of time, but I'm willing to make one last concession. Can you consider meeting me at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your continued effort to find common ground. I am willing to pay $160 for the product. This is my final offer.

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to make a final offer, but I'm still not willing to go below $175. I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. Can you consider meeting me at $170?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to pay $165 for the product. This is my final offer.
